title: (x) Dahlgren Studio - Cheltenham {Franz}
content:
Hi all,   
   
I'm looking for the font below. I was told by the client it's Novarese but it doesn't look like it is. Any ideas? ![Dahlberg Studio](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014224448im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36037.jpg)
author: emilie

comments.content: [Cheltenham](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014224448/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/cheltenham/cheltenham/testdrive.html?s=Dahlgren%2BStudio&p=72), looks like they shortened the ascender on the d so that it wouldn't touch the g. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014224448im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Yea, they had me wondering about that g haha... Thanks for the quick reply!   
   
Em
